Title: Carl's First Sentencing
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Etan Frankel, Lisa Morales (story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Carl faces the consequences of his actions and has a surprising result. Fiona helps out a friend when he really needs it. Lip comes face to face with a genuine offer and Kevin enjoys the college lifestyle a little too much.
